s.text: The New York Times reports that divers searching the Sea of Marmara Saturday, for the first time since the disaster, found more than 150 bodies, apparently those of Turks who lived in houses facing the water.

A USAT "Cover Story" gets the dirt on Jerry Baker, a self-styled "master gardener" whose folksy radio shows, how-to books, and PBS specials recommend dousing plants with mixtures that include chewing tobacco, mouthwash, and bourbon.
A NYT front-pager suggests that a byproduct of aggressive policing in New York City under Mayor Rudy Giuliani has been a rise in the number of what the paper calls "flawed arrests."
